name: serverlessdeploymentpoc
description: Starter template for serverless framework with following scope:

scripts.deploy: cd app && dotnet restore && cd InfnetAtividadesComplementaresApi && dotnet lambda package --configuration Debug --framework netcoreapp3.1 --output-package bin/release/netcoreapp3.1/serverless-application.zip && cd .. && cd .. && sls deploy
